How Our YouTube Marketing Services Help Businesses in India

As a trusted YouTube marketing company, we analyze and create a better YouTube promotion strategy when you hire our YouTube promotion company to manage your YouTube Marketing Campaigns. How Does Our YouTube Marketing Company Work?

There are two types of YouTube promotion services our top-rated YouTube marketing company offers.

Our YouTube Marketing Services Offer

Organic YouTube Management

Organic Youtube management helps you to manage and rank your videos on the first page of Google and Youtube.

Paid YouTube Promotion Services

In this management, our YouTube marketing company offers you paid YouTube marketing strategies to help your YouTube marketing objective completed.

Organic YouTube Marketing Services Include

  • Generating Keywords & Title
  • Creating Your Personalized YouTube Channel
  • #Tag Research and Card Addition in Videos
  • Audio/Video To Text (Transcription)
  • Sharing Videos
  • Video Rank Monitoring

Our Paid YouTube Marketing Services Include

Pre-Roll Video Ads

This type of YouTube video ad appears before a video load and plays for about 30 seconds. You will see a notice “Video will play after ad”.

In-Stream Ads

Your videos will be shown to users before they view a normal video. You will see a “Skip Ad” button.

Bumper Ads

If you don’t have the budget to create a longer video to run Ads on YouTube then use Bumper ad format to show a six-second, non-skippable clip before a regular video.

In-Display Ads

If you don’t want your ads to be appeared in YouTube Videos then go for In-Display Ads. You will be charged for impressions and clicks you will be getting on your In-Display ads on YouTube.

Organic YouTube Management Services Include

If you want to rank organically on YouTube then our organic YouTube SEO services will help your video to rank better. We take care of complete YouTube SEO for you when you hire us for YouTube marketing services. Here is how our YouTube marketing company helps your YouTube videos to rank:

Video Creation

We are a team of professional video videographers, editors, and voice over experts in India and we can help you to create a perfect video for your YouTube channel to engage your subscribers. We can create good quality fantastic videos to help your YouTube channel reach heights.

  • How-To Videos
  • Video Blogs
  • Corporate Promos
  • Video Ads
  • Video Testimonials
  • Explainer Videos
  • Social Engagement Videos & More

YouTube Video SEO

We do proper SEO for YouTube videos when you hire our YouTube marketing company for your YouTube marketing campaign. We write SEO friendly meta tags for your videos and follow all the YouTube SEO guidelines to rank your videos on YouTube. Our organic YouTube SEO services include following:

Video Description Copywriting

Keyword optimized Video description copywriting helps your videos to rank for relevant searches made on YouTube. Our YouTube marketing experts write SEO friendly meta tags by following YouTube guidelines to help your YouTube videos ranking.

Video Syndication

Our YouTube marketing company helps your videos to get more exposure to our video syndication/ Link building for youtube videos. More backlinks to your YouTube videos will increase their rankings on YouTube and other search engines quickly.

YouTube Ads Management Services Include

Our YouTube marketing services also help you to run paid YouTube advertising campaigns to get more exposure on YouTube in terms of more Subscribers, leads, conversions and traffic.

Display Ads

This type of YouTube Ads Appears to the right of the feature video and above the video suggestions list. For larger players, It may appear below the player.

Overlay Ads

Semi-transparent overlay ads that appear on the lower 20% portion of your video. You can find this type of ad in the footer of that running video.

Skippable Video Ads

Skippable youtube video ads allow viewers to skip ads after 5 seconds if they don’t want to watch or are interested in your ad. Inserted before, during, or after the main video.

Non-Skippable Video Ads

Non-skippable YouTube video ads can’t be skipped and you have to watch the complete ad to watch your video.

Bumper Ads

Non-skippable YouTube video ads can be up to 6 seconds and must be watched before you watch the video.

Sponsored Ads

In this type of video ad, the users will see a brief “teaser” for the sponsored card.

Frequently Asked Questions About YouTube Marketing Services

What is Youtube?

YouTube is a video sharing platform that allows users to watch, like, share, comment and upload their videos.

How Often I will Get Reports?

Reporting by RankON Technologies solely depends on the chosen Youtube Marketing package. You can probably count on it happening every month or every week.

Does it Work?

Youtube boosts SEO, drive traffic and build brand awareness, expand your social reach, market to audiences overseas, increase your ROI, and expand your video marketing plan with multiple channels.

What Are The Benefits of Youtube Marketing?
  1. Capture and grow your audience.
  2. Business can be found easier on youtube
  3. Promote events and products
What Package Should I Choose?

Youtube Marketing package should be chosen as per your business goals and objectives. We have categorized our Twitter Marketing packages in such a way that it benefits all types of businesses be it small, medium or large—scale.

What Details Do I Have To Provide?

When you contract with us for your Youtube Marketing needs, then you have to give the following details to us:

  1. Youtube Account Access
  2. Google Analytics Details
  3. Google Tag Manager
How Much YouTube Pay for 1000 Views in India (INR)

If you are a YouTuber in India and Making Youtube videos then Potential earnings can go up to Rs 200-300 per 1,000 views.
